div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 856 Pet mogili, c. 50 km. N of Sumen, Bulgaria, 1953 Burial: c. 275 B.C.? (T) Contents: c. 1000 AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: tetradr. (Amphipolis 2, "Uranopolis" 6, "Beroea" 1, Tarsus 1, Babylon 1) Disposition: Sofia 27 Gerasimov, BIAB 20 (1955), p. 607
